alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Otsego; Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 09 at 11:56PM EDT until July 10 at 3:00AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EDT MONDAY... * WHAT...While the threat of flash flooding has lessened, scattered showers and thunderstorms will redevelop overnight, with localized heavy rainfall still possible. The risk of flash flooding will end shortly after dawn. * WHERE...Portions of central New York and northeast Pennsylvania, including the following areas, in central New York, Delaware, Otsego and Sullivan. In northeast Pennsylvania, Northern Wayne, Pike and Southern Wayne. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
